reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute and appreciate its built-in shorts, comfortable fit, and stretchy material that's thicker than expected.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and comfy!
items.body: I don’t know I might have tied it up too tight but it was so cute!! It fit just right and the quality was good. Twerked in it all night so it’s definitely comfortable and stretchy. It has shorts attached which is an added bonus. Perfect for my leopard themed party. Read more
items.author: Ja'Nell Friday

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexyyyyy
items.body: Sooooo cute! I got so much attention in this dress. Plus, can we talk about the built-in SHORTS! The dress was short but the shorts really helped!! Dress was very stretchy so I went XS because I have a small waist. It was so comfortable, didn't need a bra with it and made the girls look phenomenal! I got this for a Bachelorette in Nashville and definitely got a couple free drinks in this outfit. Sexy to the max!! Read more
items.author: Jess

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy party dress
items.body: This dress is perfect for the night out! It is just the right length with shorts built in making it comfortable to move around in! If you are feeling sexy this dress is perfect for you and perfect in size! Read more
items.author: Liv

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Loved it!
items.body: I absolutely loved this. The sizing was perfect for me, the material was nice and decently thick. The only problem was the cross fell off in the wash, but it’s still super cute without it. I got so many compliments. I will definitely wear this out again. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this fit
items.body: It has shorts like a romper because it’s a mini skirt dress. It’s easy to get on and off. You will need boob tape or some cups if you are heavy chest. I loved the color even though the underside of the print is white and the dress is red and black. I love the quality and style of the dress. It was very comfortable to wear. Read more
items.author: laura

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars love
items.body: love this dress and it covers the stomach area and makes my girls look amazing! It’s also very stretchy and comfy Read more
items.author: Alexandra Lizarraga

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap jewelry part
items.body: Emblem fell off after a hour/: Read more
items.author: Savanna redding

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress
items.body: I really liked this dress! I got so many compliments on it and dang it’s gorgeous and flattering! Read more
items.author: Megan Hsu

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burgundy Leopard, Brown Leopard, Grey Leopard. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
